events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit and I would like a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized as a Refund issue based on their message about returning the jacket and refund.
The case was assigned to refund specialist agent Sarah to assist the customer with the return and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you'd like to return the jacket for a refund. How can I assist you today?
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for the refund process?
My order number is 789456123. Yes, the jacket is unused and still in the original packaging as I just received it yesterday.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back using our prepaid return label, and once we receive it, we will process your full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick help. I will send the package back tomorrow using the label.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect on your original payment method.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help you with.
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully completed and no further action is required on your part.
